page.description: A textbox property displays data in a textbox control. This control is typically used for editable data. Textbox controls can be optionally configured as a Lookup, Edit-combo, or Auto-suggest control. See the 'Lookup' property in the property grid.

section.description: Visit the [TextBox] section of the documentation for guides on implementing textbox controls in a UX component.
